sourcesContent:
const Input = ({className, field}) => {
  const {type, placeholder} = field
  const currentClassName = className
    ? `${className}__input`
    : 'input'
    
  return `
    <input
      data-input="${type}"
      data-success="false"
      class={currentClassName} 
      type="${type}" 
      placeholder="${placeholder}" 
    />
  ` 
}

export default Input
